choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
### Assistant:

Breakfast: Greek yogurt with honey, granola and berries
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette
Snack: Carrots and hummus
Dinner: Baked salmon with steamed broccoli and quinoa
